article.title: U.S. Army Modifies Radar Systems Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corp., Liverpool, N.Y., was awarded an $11,989,659 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract. The award will provide for the modification of an existing contract to procure interim contractor support for the AN/TPQ-53 radar systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Md.
